rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entrance space with a small waiting area that leads to the living room.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious Scandinavian-style living room featuring minimalistic decor and ample natural light from north-facing windows.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the kitchen for a fluid dining experience; designed with Scandinavian aesthetics.

rooms.name: Open Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern open-plan kitchen featuring state-of-the-art appliances and ample storage space. North facing windows to enhance natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A premium master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and wardrobe; positioned to maximize calmness according to Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with a private bathroom adjacent; designed for hospitality and relaxation.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: An exclusive gym area on the ground floor that offers ample space for exercise equipment, ventilation, and natural light.

openings.description: A well-sized entrance door with Scandinavian design elements; aligning with Vastu's preference for a north-facing entry.
Large windows placed strategically to maximize natural light and adherence to Scandinavian design.
